item.title: Data Structures in Python
item.description: When we code in Python usually there are multiple data structures such as list, tuple, set, and dict that we mostly use. But besides these four, Python has other data structures that each of them like those four has some strengths and weaknesses based on their implementation and structure that we can use, and it’s better to know them because sometimes it might help and have a better performance and features based on your problem than list, tuple, set, and dict.
